response.name: Emissions from Energy Consumption at Conventional Power Plants and Combined-Heat-and-Power Plants
response.description:
Emissions from electricity generation and the production of useful thermal output at conventional power plants and combined-heat-and-power plants.
    See Electric Power Annual, Technical Notes for a description of the sources and methodology used to develop the emissions estimates.
    Sources: Forms EIA-860, EIA-923, and calculations made by the Office of  Energy Production, Conversion & Delivery (EPCD)
    Product: State Electricity Profiles, Table 7

frequency.description: One data point for each calendar year.
